content.prompt: Dr. Copeland found that ballet dancers on a carbohydrate-rich diet had greater activity levels in the somatic nervous system. Which is a prediction that can be made from these findings?

choices.label: The nervous system activation of untrained dancers on carbohydrate-rich diets would be similar.
The nervous system activation for any other type of dancers on carbohydrate-rich diets would be similar.
The dancers will make fewer mistakes on the carbohydrate-rich diet.
The dancers will make fewer mistakes on the protein-rich diet.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
